貀字的基本解释

貀
nà
古书上说的一种野兽。形状似海狗，长有豹纹，有角，两足；一说似虎而黑，无前两足。

貀字的汉语字典释义

[①]［nà］
［《廣韻》女滑切，入黠，娘。］
亦作“豽1”。
兽名。其形状及属类各家说法不一。

貀字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【豸字部】　貀； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1200第25
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?女滑切，音肭。【爾雅·釋獸】貀，無前前足。【註】晉太康七年，召陵扶夷縣檻得一獸，似狗豹文，有角兩前足，卽此種類也。或說貀似虎而黑，無兩足。【說文】漢律，能捕豺貀，購百錢。【唐書·回鶻傳】黠戛斯，古堅昆國，其獸有野馬、骨貀。【異物志】貀出朝鮮，似狸，蒼黑色，無前兩足，能捕䑕。?藏器曰：骨豽獸出西方突厥國，似狐而大，長尾。【臨海志】狀如鹿形，頭似狗，出東海水中。?宗奭曰：今出登萊州，狀非狗非獸非魚。前腳似獸，尾卽魚，身有短靑白毛，毛有黑點。或曰方書膃肭臍卽貀外腎。○按?說與《爾雅》不合，存以備考。　又【集韻】當沒切，音咄。又女骨切，音䖦。義?同。

考證：〔【爾雅·釋獸】貀無前足。【註】或說，貀似虎而黑，無兩足。〕　謹照原文兩足上增前字。
貀字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
貀字的起名意思

暂无。

Puffer
Basic explanation of words
Puffer
nà
A kind of beast said in ancient books. It looks like a sea dog, with leopard prints, horns, and two legs; in other words, it looks like a tiger but black, without front two legs.
Puffer
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［nà］
["Guangyun" female slide cut, enter the point, mother. ]
Also known as "豽1".
Animal name. There are different opinions about its shape and category.
Puffer
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Youth Concentration】【Zizi Department】　貀; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1200 No. 25
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Positive Rhyme]? Female slippery cut, sound 肭. 【Erya·Shi Beast】Fugu, without forefoot. [Note] In the 7th year of Jin Taikang, Fuyi County, Zhaoling, had a beast that looked like a dog and leopard, with horns and two forefoot, and it was also of this kind. In other words, the fish is black like a tiger, without two legs. [Speaking text] Han law, can catch jackals and buy a hundred dollars. [Tangshu·Uighur Biography] Shijiasi, Gu Jiankun, its beasts include wild horses and bone frogs. [Foreign Object History] The frog is out of North Korea, like a raccoon dog, pale black, without two legs, able to catch pi. ?Tibetan said: The bone beast came out of the Western Turkic countries, and it was as big as a fox and had a long tail. 【Linhai History】It looks like a deer with its head like a dog, out of the East Sea. Zongshi said: I am out of Deng Laizhou today, and I am not a dog, a beast, or a fish. The forefoot is like a beast, the tail is a fish, and the body has short white hair and black spots on the hair. Or it is said that Fang Shuxiong umbilical and external kidney. ○It is said that it is incompatible with "Er Ya", so keep it for future examinations.　[Jiyun] When there is no cut, sound duh. The female bones are cut, and the sound is Ji. Righteous? Same. Textual research: [[Erya·Shiju] The fish has no forefoot. [Note] In other words, the fish is black like a tiger, without two legs. 〕　I would like to add the previous word on both feet according to the original text.
